column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I ordered a cup of soup and the charred romaine salad
column2: while my husband ordered the pulled pork sandwich. The sandwich was the one positive part of our experience - the bread was delicious as was the sriracha bbq sauce. My potato soup came
column3: which was fine. Unremarkable. While I was waiting for my salad to come
column4: a sous chef comes over and tells me that the chef isn't pleased with how the salad is turning out and won't be serving it. This is fine
column5: and I respect a chef's decision not to send out sub-par food. However
column6: there wasn't really a good substitute on the menu. I already had my cup of soup
column7: and I just wanted a salad. After looking over the limited options (it's a small menu) she suggested the fried eggplant side dish.
